thread.title: Woman falls from 17th floor in UAE, people at home clueless
thread.title_full: Woman falls from 17th floor in UAE, people at home clueless

title: Woman falls from 17th floor in UAE, people at home clueless
text:
Woman falls from 17th floor in UAE, people at home clueless Afkar Abdullah /Sharjah   | Last updated on February 28, 2017 at 05.10 pm Share More > Vote 
A view of the building from where the Iranian women fell down and died in Sharjah. (Photo by M.Sajjad) A neighbor said that he always used to see the two women together and that they didn't show any kind of abnormal behavior. Sharjah Police is investigating the death of a 40-year-old Iranian woman who fell from the 17 th floor of the Al SAS tower in Al Taawun area in Sharjah. Po
